Key Match Events: France scored the only goal of the match
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps praised his team's performance
Randal Kolo Muani discussed his lucky goal
Kevin De Bruyne expressed disappointment about Belgium's loss
Domenico Tedesco mentioned analyzing the games and the Euros
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jules Kounde was named the player of the match
Others: The win sets France up for a quarter-final match with either Portugal or Slovenia
